statement.p: A triangular parcel of land has sides of lengths \displaystyle{820}. feet, \displaystyle{160}. feet and \displaystyle{845} feet. Notice all three of these measurements are precise to the ones digit.

li.p: What is the area of the parcel of land? Round your answer to appropriate significant digits.
If land is valued at 1600 per acre (1 acre is 43,560 \displaystyle\text{ft}^{{2}} ), what is the value of the parcel of land? Base on rounded area. Round your value to the nearest dollar.
